value.name: Government delays North Sea oil legislation due to lack of Commons time
value.description: Government legislation designed to maximise North Sea oil and gas production has been delayed to avoid it being rushed through its first stage in 45 minutes. The Offshore Petroleum Licensing Bill would require the industry regulator to run annual rounds for new oil and gas licences, subject to stringent new emissions and imports tests.

value.name: ‘Stark’ famine risk as UK lobbies Israel to allow more aid to reach Gaza

value.name: Political map of Wokingham redrawn for 2024 election
value.description: The political map of Wokingham, the Reading suburbs and surrounding villages has been redrawn ahead of the full council election coming this May.

value.name: Liberal Democrats announce candidate for new East Grinstead and Uckfield seat in next general election
value.description: The Liberal Democrats have announced that they have selected an environmental policy expert to be their MP candidate for the new constituency of East Grinstead and Uckfield.
